name: Cubetastic (AriCs)
description:
Hi,I'm Arics and this is my first game made in Unity.

How to Download this game?

If you have downloaded it from the Itch.io website (this page), the file is downloaded is a "zip file",  right click and press extract it, then run (double click)

Controls

Movement: A and D.
